public com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONObject buildJSONObject()
Description copied from interface: JSONizable
Build (and return) a JSONObject that contains all the items of this object. If required, will call buildJSONObject() on any contained JSONizable objects, thus producing an entire JSON tree.
